amendment.description: To require a report on Civilian Conservation Centers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3977 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3977 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5904; text: CR S5904) To require a report on Civilian Conservation Centers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3977 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Merkley to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3977 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
